Module luke.qam2
Package luke.qam2

Class HelperFunctions

java.lang.Object
luke.qam2.HelperFunctions
public abstract class HelperFunctions extends Object
Class containing miscellaneous static functions to ease implementation

    • displayError

      public static void displayError(Supplier<String> inFunctionalInterface)
      Displays an error. Input is a lambda expression. A lambda is used here because we can input logical checks for language easily in the lambda and return the corresponding string

    • updateCustomersAndAppointments

      public static void updateCustomersAndAppointments() throws SQLException
      Updates the 2 static lists for customers and appointments. The information is pulled from the database and preps it for entry into the front-end tables

      SQLException
